Package ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AuthorEdit
    View containing three fragments/tabs: - AuthorEdit_Preview - AuthorEdit_Overview - AuthorEdit_Edit TODO: Load data from the model TODO: Send changes to the controller
    AuthorEdit_Edit
    Fragment controlled by AuthorEdit view Contains editing fields for a custom FragmentView
    AuthorEdit_Overview
    Fragment owned by the AuthorEdit view Shows a dynamically-created tree represetning the nodes of the current story.
    AuthorEdit_Preview
    Fragment owned by the AuthorEdit view.
    AuthorStories
    View containing list of stories created by the author TODO: Link with Model
    AuthorStoryDescription
    View containing description of story create by author.
    BrowseFragment
    Fragment owned by BrowseView.
    BrowseView
    View accessed via MainView > ~Browse button~ Contains three fragments/tabs where user can see list of cached stories, authored stories, and online stories.
    ContinueView
    View holding list of bookmarks.
    FragmentView
    View Accessed via MainView > Continue > ~Select Item~ or via MainView > BrowseView > StoryDescription > ~Play / Continue item ~

    Holds Horizontal filmstrip containing illustrations at top of page, story fragment text in the view, and an actions buttons at the bottom of the page.
    MainView
    The first and main activity of the application.
    StoryDescription
    View accessed via MainView > BrowseView > ~Select item~ Show synopsis & more details about selected story.
    StoryDescription.StoryDescriptionFragment
